pl.matblog.hpcimagetransform

Class HPCBitmapModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.matblog.hpcimagetransform.HPCBitmapModel

  • public class HPCBitmapModel
extends java.lang.Object
    HPCBitmapModel with pixel shaders applying methods The source code distributed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 (Attribution-commercial use) Details: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/ Created by Mateusz_Mierzwinski on 16.11.14.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int bitmapId
      Int describing bitmapId for mapping to name proposes.
      private java.awt.Color[][] bitmapPixelData
      AWT.Color for better transform as it's have RGBA structure and special getters/setters for R,G,B and Alpha channels.
      private java.awt.Point bitmapSize
      Point describing width and height of the bitmap, as it's AWT.Color two dimmensional array

    • Constructor Summary

      Bitmap constructor for fast object build

        bitmapId - - bitmap ID mapped from name
        bitmapSize - - bitmap size in pixels
        bitmapPixelData - - bitmap Pixel data as AWT.Color array

    • Method Detail

      • getPixelColor

        public java.awt.Color getPixelColor(java.awt.Point pixelCoordinates)
                             throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException,
                                    java.lang.NullPointerException
        Return pixel color as AWT.Color object from specified coordinates (X,Y) of the bitmap
        Parameters:
        pixelCoordinates - - pixel coordinates (X, Y)
        Returns:
        - returned pixel color
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - - coordinates out of bitmapPixelData bounds
        java.lang.NullPointerException - - null at pixelCoordinates, bitmapPixelData or pixelColor in the array.

      • setPixelColor

        public void setPixelColor(java.awt.Point pixelCoordinates,

                   throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException,
                          java.lang.NullPointerException
        Pixel color set
        Parameters:
        pixelCoordinates - - pixel coordinates (X, Y)
        pixelColor - - pixel color (AWT.Color)
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - - coordinates out of bitmapPixelData bounds
        java.lang.NullPointerException - - null at pixelCoordinates, bitmapPixelData or pixelColor
